name: schema-filter
description: given schema, this package extracts all available queries, mutations, subscriptions and then make list of those to determine whether to use each graphql operation, by using that check-list, reduced-schema is generated
author: KyungHo Park <crorowslowpp@gmail.com>

scripts.update: yarn run introspect && yarn run filter && yarn run generate
scripts.on: npx ts-node gql/editor.ts on && yarn filter
scripts.off: npx ts-node gql/editor.ts off && yarn filter
scripts.filter: npx ts-node gql/index.ts && wc -l gql/schema-original.graphql && wc -l gql/schema-operation-filtered.graphql && wc -l gql/schema-filtered.graphql
